jobDescription: About Us AppDynamics is the Application Intelligence company. With AppDynamics, enterprises have real-time insights into application performance, user performance and business performance so they can move faster in an increasingly sophisticated, software-driven world. Our integrated suite of products is built on our innovative, enterprise-grade App iQ Platform that enables our customers to make faster decisions that enhance customer engagement and improve operational and business performance. AppDynamics is uniquely positioned to enable enterprises to accelerate their digital transformations by actively monitoring, analyzing, and optimizing complex application environments at scale which has led to proven success and trust with the Global 2000.  About You First and foremost, S./M.S. Degree in CS / EE (or related) from a top schoolSubstantial hands-on experience with data systems Spark, Hadoop, Elastic Search, SQL.Demonstrated experience productizing complex data systems (including tuning, administration, security, deployment, and transition to operations)Expert knowledge of Python, Java, multi-threaded developmentKnowledge of cloud computing infrastructure (e.g. EC2, S3, ELB, EMR) and their use in practiceAbout the Team At AppDynamics, our goal is to make it simple to manage modern, distributed, and extremely complex applications residing in both the cloud and the data center. Our customers run some of the largest web sites on the planet, and use our products to monitor and troubleshoot applications distributed across thousands of servers.  It is our teams responsibility to automate many of the monitoring and troubleshooting tasks using intelligent models and algorithms. We achieve this by developing and operationalizing algorithms and models that extracts actionable insights from the massive amount of data our product collects. We help our customers to spot problems earlier, identify root causes faster, and resolve them sooner all with less efforts. We use machine learning and many statistics tools to mine patterns and anomalies.  If you have a passion for searching solution for big data problems, building it out, and then tuning and productizing it to make it operationally rock solid, we want to talk to you!
